name: Real Chess Masters - Easy chess checker board with two player and tournament game mode
name_original: Real Chess Masters - Easy chess checker board with two player and tournament game mode
description:
Real Chess Masters is newest chess game on App Store. Very easy to play and nicely designed to engage you for a long time while making your strategies.

Game has 3 Play modes

VS Mode: Its a two player mode, you can invite your friend to play chess with you on the same device

Friendly Mode: Select your country and have a quick chess match with opponent country

Tournament Mode: Its real tournament simulation, beat the teams one by one to qualify for final.

Should you have any suggestions or feedback? Do not hesitate to ask. Send us email on ask.airbornestudio@gmail.com
